title: Continuing education credits (CME, CLE, CPE)
dataVerified: Professional name, license number, course title, provider name, credit hours, completion date, certificate number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Certificate format. Professional appearance. Verification for license renewal. Prevents fake CE credits for medical, legal, and accounting professionals. Domain binding verifies legitimate education providers. Professionals can verify credits without requesting duplicate certificates.
